# Stage 2 â€“ Visualizing Relationships (30 DP)

We will explore **Sales vs each advertising channel**.

### Example (TV vs Sales):

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ads |>
  ggplot(aes(x = TV, y = Sales)) |>
  geom_point() |>
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) |>
  labs(
    title = "TV Ad Spend vs Sales",
    x = "TV Ad Spend (thousands)",
    y = "Sales (thousands)"
  )
```
